name: Wilfred, the Esteemed Wizard
attack_flv_texts: Wilfred dives his hand into his robe, preparing to fling powder at you.
Wilfred begins to chant a spell. He's about to attack.
Wilfred waves his hands sporadically. He's casting a terrible rune.
Wilfred reveals a dark orb with a grin. He looks menacing.
defend_flv_texts: Wilfred summons a shield. He hides behind it.
idle_flv_texts: Wilfred grins smugly, all defenses recklessly abandoned.

name: Possesed Nutcracker
attack_flv_texts: Possesed Nutcracker prepares for a quick swipe of the sword.
Possesed Nutcracker steps back with sword back, ready to lunge.
Possesed Nutcracker mechanically stoops for a quick jump forward.
Possesed Nutcraker is ready to flurry! You see a glint in it's cold eyes.
defend_flv_texts: {name} steps back and raises its sword in a defensive posture.
idle_flv_texts: {name} cocks it's head quizzically - it seems confused.
